block.p: $655,000 140 Charles Street (Washington Street) (Memphis) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 787-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; dining area, hardwood floors, north and east exposures; terrace; common charge $789; taxes $5,079; listed at $675,000, 5 weeks on market (broker: Bellmarc Realty)

$655,000 140 Charles Street (Washington Street) (Memphis) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 787-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; dining area, hardwood floors, north and east exposures; terrace; common charge $789; taxes $5,079; listed at $675,000, 5 weeks on market (broker: Bellmarc Realty)

$1.98 million 20 East 20th Street (Gramercy House) 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 3,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; open floor plan with 15- to 18-ft. ceilings in kitchen, skylight in living room, north and south exposures; maintenance $995, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $1.9 million (multiple bids), 6 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

$840,000 24 West 45th Street (Academy House) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,554-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar loft building; part-time concierge, keyed elevator; kitchen with granite countertops, maple cabinets and stainless steel appliances, 9-ft. ceilings, oversize windows, 3 exposures, central air-conditioning, washer/dryer in unit; common charge $930; taxes $10,092; listed at $850,000, 23 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$740,000 196 Edgecombe Avenue (145th Street) 5-bedroom, 4-bath brownstone; dining room, windowed kitchen, one working and two decorative fireplaces, high ceilings, hardwood floors, original moldings and detail; 2-car garage, 17-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,629; listed at $750,000, 13 weeks on market (broker: Klara Madlin Real Estate)

$230,000 100 Overlook Terrace (190th Street) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 725-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. security, renovated kitchen, French doors, south exposure; maintenance $425, 40% tax-deductible; listed at $239,000, 11 weeks on market (broker: Simone Song Properties)

$360,000 153 Lafayette Avenue 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 850-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; renovated kitchen and bath, high ceilings, 2 exposures; maintenance $599, 39% tax-deductible; listed at $360,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group Brooklyn)

$820,000 444 12th Street (Ansonia Mews) 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,600-sq.-ft. co-op in a renovated prewar factory; concierge; kitchen with granite countertops, 26-ft. living room, harbor view, terrace; common charge $600; taxes abated for 14 years; listed at $840,000, 5 weeks on market (broker: Warren Lewis Realty)

$660,000 601 18th Street 4-family, 2-story, prewar brick house; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, eat-in kitchen in each unit; new roof, rear garden, 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,982; listed at $720,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Brenton Realty)

$520,000 61-31 56th Road 2-family, 94-year-old wood-frame house; 2 bedrooms, dining room, eat-in kitchen, 6 closets in primary duplex; 2 bedrooms in other unit; 1 bath in each; 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,873; listed at $560,000, 6 weeks on market (broker: Remax-FH Realty)

$1.15 million 310 Palisade Avenue 5-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 81-year-old two-story stucco Mediterranean-style house; dining room, renovated eat-in kitchen, living room with fireplace, whirlpool bath and balcony off master bedroom suite, central air-conditioning; 2-car garage, 0.38-acre lot; taxes $20,813; listed at $1.195 million, 19 weeks on market (broker: Coldwell Banker/Ye Village)

$657,500 2 Doolin Road 5-bedroom, 3-bath, 5-year-old colonial-style house; 2-story entry, great room with stone fireplace, semifinished basement; in-ground pool with waterfall, 3-car garage, 0.81-acre lot; taxes $12,283; listed at $665,000, 4 weeks on market (brokers: Coldwell Banker/New City; Prudential Rand)
